education.course_work: Database Management, Basic Programming, Object Oriented Programming, Web Programming, Software Modeling, Digital Simulation, Computer System, Basic Computer Network, Basic Graphic Design;

biography.body: My first experience with programming was on school in vocational high school majored software engineering. I learned most of these skills in self-taught way because it felt more flexible and independent for myself. I also joined programming community to share about knowledge and experiences with other members.
